trans-unit.source: Represents a single tab page in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma única página da guia em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls represent the tabbed pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controles representam as páginas com guias em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controle.

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection reflects the order of tabs in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: A ordem das guias no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção reflete a ordem das guias no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controle.

trans-unit.source: To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a ordem das guias no controle, você deve alterar suas posições na coleção por removê-los e inseri-los em novos índices.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class will have no effect, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controles são restritas por seus contêineres, para algumas das propriedades herdadas do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> classe base não terá efeito, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The tabs in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> are part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> but not parts of the individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls.
trans-unit.target: As guias em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> fazem parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> , mas não as partes do indivíduo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controles.

trans-unit.source: Members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: Membros do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> classe, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> propriedade afeta apenas o retângulo de cliente da página da guia, mas não as guias.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> não ocultará a guia. Para ocultar a guia, você deve remover o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controlar do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], a guia é considerada parte da página da guia para determinar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do .NET Framework, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> não ocorrem quando o foco entra ou sai de uma guia, mas somente quando o foco entra ou sai do retângulo de cliente da página da guia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como esse controle responde para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> métodos, consulte o seguinte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> membros: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Controls contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: Controles contidos em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> não são criadas até que a página da guia é mostrada e quaisquer associações de dados nesses controles não são ativadas até que a página da guia é exibida.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> propriedade permite que você indique se o plano de fundo da página da guia deve renderizar usando o estilo visual atual.

trans-unit.source: This occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores de propriedade são ambos `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the background is painted normally.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o plano de fundo é pintado normalmente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.%23ctor%2A> constructor instantiates `tabPage1`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.%23ctor%2A> construtor instancia `tabPage1`.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: O texto da guia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> class and specifies the text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> e especifica o texto da guia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property is set to the value of the `text` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> propriedade é definida como o valor de `text` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.%23ctor%2A> constructor accepts the `myTabPage` string as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> for `tabPage1`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.%23ctor%2A> construtor aceita o `myTabPage` de cadeia de caracteres como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> para `tabPage1`.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Embora você possa alterar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> propriedade e lidar com esse evento para determinar quando o valor é alterado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The control grows as much as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of its size property
trans-unit.target: O controle aumenta conforme o necessário para ajustar seu conteúdo, mas não é menor do que o valor de sua propriedade de tamanho reduzido

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor da tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, in which case the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> propriedade é o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores de propriedade são ambos `true` e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> tem um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, caso em que o valor padrão da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> é de propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Controles filho que você coloque no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> herdam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> valor por padrão, portanto, isso faz com que o plano de fundo do filho controles para processar com o estilo visual atual.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> propriedade define automaticamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value that you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property after you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> em segundo plano para renderizar usando estilos visuais, mas você deseja que os controles filho para herdar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> valor que você especificar, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> propriedade depois de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da coleção de controle para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> atribuído ao controle.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.DockChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A> propriedade não é significativa para esse controle, embora você possa alterar seu valor e tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.DockChanged> evento para detectar a alteração.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.EnabledChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A> propriedade não é significativa para esse controle, embora você possa alterar seu valor e tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.EnabledChanged> evento para detectar a alteração.

trans-unit.source: The object to look for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser pesquisado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the tab page that contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera a página da guia que contém o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> that contains the specified object, or <see langword="null" /> if the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> que contém o objeto especificado ou <see langword="null" />, se o objeto não pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objects, each containing one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> component.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> com dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objetos, cada um contendo uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> componente.

trans-unit.source: The parameter `button2` is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.GetTabPageOfComponent%2A> method, which retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> containing `button2`.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro `button2` é passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.GetTabPageOfComponent%2A> método, que recupera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> contendo `button2`.

trans-unit.source: To verify that the correct tab page is retrieved, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> property sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> containing `button2` to the currently selected tab page.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar se a página da guia correto é recuperada, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> conjuntos de propriedades de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> contendo `button2` para a guia selecionada no momento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index to the image displayed on this tab.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da imagem exibida nessa guia.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index to the image in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList" /> that appears on the tab. The default is -1, which signifies no image.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero para a imagem no <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList" /> que aparece na guia. O padrão é -1, o que não significa que nenhuma imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A> points to an image in the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A> aponta para uma imagem associada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A> property to specify which image from `myImages` displays on the tab of `tabPage1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A> propriedade para especificar qual imagem de `myImages` exibe na guia de `tabPage1`.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.ComponentModel>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms>, and <xref:System.Resources> namespace for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.ComponentModel>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms>, e <xref:System.Resources> namespace para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex" /> value is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex" /> é menor que -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key accessor for the image in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList" /> of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o acessador de chave para a imagem no <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key of the image.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa a chave da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageKey%2A> property specifies the image from the image list to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageKey%2A> propriedade especifica a imagem da lista de imagens para exibir no controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The x and y coordinates which specifies the location of the object.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas x e y que especifica o local do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Embora você possa alterar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> propriedade e lidar com esse evento para determinar quando o valor é alterado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The upper limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: O limite superior do tamanho do objeto.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The lower limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: O limite inferior do tamanho do objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], a guia é considerada parte da página da guia para determinar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do .NET Framework, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> não ocorrem quando o foco entra ou sai de uma guia, mas somente quando o foco entra ou sai do retângulo de cliente da página da guia.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], a guia é considerada parte da página da guia para determinar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do .NET Framework, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> não ocorrem quando o foco entra ou sai de uma guia, mas somente quando o foco entra ou sai do retângulo de cliente da página da guia.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains data useful for painting the background.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém dados úteis para pintar a tela de fundo.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Pinta a tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The system calls this method to paint the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: O sistema chama esse método para pintar o plano de fundo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, this method paints the background using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores de propriedade são ambos `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, esse método pinta o plano de fundo usando o estilo visual atual.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method paints the background as usual.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, esse método pinta o plano de fundo como de costume.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de uma área retangular na qual o controle pode conter.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" />.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />.
trans-unit.target: Este membro substitui <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The tab order of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ordem das guias do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade indica a ordem na qual os controles recebem foco como um usuário pressiona a tecla TAB em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controles contidos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controla, no entanto e não recebe foco individualmente como parte da ordem de tabulação do formulário.

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade, portanto, não tem sentida para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndexChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A> propriedade não é significativa para esse controle, embora você possa alterar seu valor e tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndexChanged> evento para detectar a alteração.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controles contidos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controles e não recebe foco individualmente como parte da ordem de tabulação do formulário.

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade, portanto, não tem sentida para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStopChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A> propriedade não é significativa para esse controle, embora você possa alterar seu valor e tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStopChanged> evento para detectar a alteração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a ser exibido na guia.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido na guia.

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode.Fixed>.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> o valor da propriedade não centralizar automaticamente o novo valor na guia se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode.Fixed>.

trans-unit.source: You can work around this limitation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property or by removing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection and adding it back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode contornar essa limitação, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade ou removendo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleta e adicioná-lo de volta para a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Both of these actions will automatically center the text.
trans-unit.target: Ambas as ações serão automaticamente centralizar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property sets the tab page text to `myTabPage`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> propriedade define o texto da guia `myTabPage`.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto de ToolTip para essa guia.

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: O texto de ToolTip para essa guia.

trans-unit.source: This tab page belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: Esta página de guia pertence a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O texto de dica de ferramenta é exibida quando o usuário move o mouse sobre a guia se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about ToolTips, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre dicas de ferramenta, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> com dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is set to allow ToolTips, and the tab pages are assigned ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> está definido para permitir que as dicas de ferramenta e as páginas de guia são atribuídas a texto de dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text" />.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ToString%2A> method creates a string that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> value for `tabPage1` and returns it to the `tabPage1`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ToolTipText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ToString%2A> método cria uma cadeia de caracteres que inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> valor para `tabPage1` e retorna-o para o `tabPage1` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> é renderizado usando o estilo visual atual quando os estilos visuais estiverem habilitados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para renderizar a tela de fundo usando o estilo visual atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background uses the current visual style only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> em segundo plano usa o estilo visual atual somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores de propriedade são ambos `true`.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores de propriedade são ambos `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, o valor padrão da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> é de propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Controles filho que você coloque no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> herdam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> valor por padrão, portanto, isso faz com que o plano de fundo do filho controles para processar com o estilo visual atual.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> propriedade define automaticamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value that you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property after you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> em segundo plano para renderizar usando estilos visuais, mas você deseja que os controles filho para herdar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> valor que você especificar, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> propriedade depois de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para ocultar uma guia em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, você deve removê-lo do controle de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.VisibleChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A> propriedade não é significativa para esse controle, embora você possa alterar seu valor e tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.VisibleChanged> evento para detectar a alteração.

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para ocultar uma guia em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, você deve removê-lo do controle de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> coleção.
